channel.title: 2 basic questions, itd be a great help if u answer
channel.description:
well i have a testscape source and i am wondering how to edit 2 things:
1.how can i make it so that everyone has inf run energy
and
2.how do i mkae it so the ::char screen only shows up when u log in for the 1st time, not everytime u log in?
itd be awesone if u answered :D

item.title: 2 basic questions, itd be a great help if u answer

item.title: 2 basic questions, itd be a great help if u answer
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok to make inf run first of all find this in client.java

//Energy

replace it with::

//Energy if (playerEnergy < 1000) { if (playerEnergyGian >= server.EnergyRegian) { playerEnergy += 1000; playerEnergyGian = 1000; } playerEnergyGian++; if (playerEnergy >= 1000) { WriteEnergy(); }

that shud give u 1000 energy =]

Read full topic
